channel.title: Self-host on Tech Shinobi
channel.description: Recent content in Self-host on Tech Shinobi

item.title: Self-hosting RustDesk Server via Docker Compose
item.description: RustDesk is my favorite remote desktop tool which is the best alternative to any closed-source solutions, such as TeamViewer and Anydesk. It’s kinda like Bitwarden in the post-breach era of the cloud password manager (LastPass/1Password) market. As a light user of RustDesk, I use it only occasionally. So I didn’t setup my own RD server on VPS even though I suppose to. For some reason, one of my RustDesk client got blocked to the official servers.
